headline.main: Israeli Teenager Stabbed in West Bank a U.S. Citizen: State Dept.
headline.print_headline: Israeli Teenager Stabbed in West Bank a U.S. Citizen: State Dept.

docs.snippet: A 13-year-old Israeli girl fatally stabbed in her bedroom in the occupied West Bank on Thursday was a U.S. citizen, the State Department said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A 13-year-old Israeli girl fatally stabbed in her bedroom in the occupied West Bank on Thursday was a U.S. citizen, the State Department said.

headline.main: Hate Crime Reports Surge in Britain After Divisive EU Referendum, Police Say
headline.print_headline: Hate Crime Reports Surge in Britain After Divisive EU Referendum, Police Say

docs.snippet: The number of hate crimes reported to British police online, including some assaults, has increased by more than 500 percent in the week after the country voted to leave the European Union, a senior police chief said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The number of hate crimes reported to British police online, including some assaults, has increased by more than 500 percent in the week after the country voted to leave the European Union, a senior police chief said on Thursday.

headline.main: Human, Bear Conflicts on the Rise in Northern Rockies
headline.print_headline: Human, Bear Conflicts on the Rise in Northern Rockies

docs.snippet: Grizzly bears have rebounded from widespread extermination across the Northern Rockies over the past several decades. But conflicts with humans have been on the rise, and the death of a Montana man on Wednesday brings to at least seven the number ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Grizzly bears have rebounded from widespread extermination across the Northern Rockies over the past several decades. But conflicts with humans have been on the rise, and the death of a Montana man on Wednesday brings to at least seven the number of people fatally mauled by bears in the region since 2010.

headline.main: Amid Crisis, Support Grows for Puerto Rico Statehood
headline.print_headline: Amid Crisis, Support Grows for Puerto Rico Statehood

docs.snippet: Porfirio Guerrero has grown increasingly frustrated as a decade-long recession has sapped business from his tailor shop in the Puerto Rican capital. He now feels the only way for the island to recover is to become a full-fledged part of the United...
docs.lead_paragraph: Porfirio Guerrero has grown increasingly frustrated as a decade-long recession has sapped business from his tailor shop in the Puerto Rican capital. He now feels the only way for the island to recover is to become a full-fledged part of the United States, a sentiment that is gaining force in the territory.

headline.main: EU Approves Italian Contingency Plan to Guarantee Bank Liquidity
headline.print_headline: EU Approves Italian Contingency Plan to Guarantee Bank Liquidity

docs.snippet: The European Commission has authorised an Italian government plan to guarantee liquidity for banks in the event of a financial crisis in the euro zone's third-largest economy, an EU executive spokeswoman said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: The European Commission has authorised an Italian government plan to guarantee liquidity for banks in the event of a financial crisis in the euro zone's third-largest economy, an EU executive spokeswoman said on Thursday.

headline.main: Contractor Will Testify in Lawsuit Over Fatal Christmas Fire
headline.print_headline: Contractor Will Testify in Lawsuit Over Fatal Christmas Fire

docs.snippet: A contractor who initially took the blame for accidentally starting a fire in Connecticut that killed his girlfriend's three children and her parents on Christmas morning in 2011 will testify in a wrongful-death lawsuit and turn over documents, hi...
docs.lead_paragraph: A contractor who initially took the blame for accidentally starting a fire in Connecticut that killed his girlfriend's three children and her parents on Christmas morning in 2011 will testify in a wrongful-death lawsuit and turn over documents, his lawyer said Thursday.

headline.main: New York Architects to Design Obama Library in Chicago
headline.print_headline: New York Architects to Design Obama Library in Chicago

docs.snippet: Barack Obama's presidential library on Chicago's South side will be designed by a New York architectural firm that designed the David Logan Center for the Arts at the University of Chicago....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barack Obama's presidential library on Chicago's South side will be designed by a New York architectural firm that designed the David Logan Center for the Arts at the University of Chicago.
